name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven **Senior Python Engineer** with 13+ years of experience in delivering scalable applications, specializing in **FastAPI**, **Python**, and **React**. Proven expertise in building cloud-native systems on **AWS** utilizing **ECS** and **Fargate**, along with containerization using **Docker** and implementing robust **CI/CD** pipelines. Skilled in data processing and model inference, well-versed in natural language processing (**NLP**) methodologies.

Accomplished in crafting high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors, with a strong foundation in backend development and deployment strategies. Demonstrated capability in developing AI/ML-powered platforms to facilitate predictive analytics and automation. Proficient in compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, ensuring quality and security in all deployments. Strong background in MLOps, enhancing model training, serving, and orchestration using advanced tools. Passionate about adopting scalable architectures that drive innovation.

experience.responsibilities:
- Designed and built full-stack platforms for healthcare and fintech using **Python** (**FastAPI**) and **React** (versions **17-18**), ensuring applications meet industry standards for security and data privacy.
- Developed scalable architectures with **Docker** and AWS services like **ECS** and **Fargate** to support high availability and fault tolerance in cloud deployments.
- Created CI/CD pipelines utilizing industry-standard tools for continuous integration and delivery, enhancing deployment speed and reliability for applications.
- Implemented data processing strategies, focusing on efficient management of large datasets, leveraging **NLP** techniques to optimize data workflows and insights.
- Managed model inference processes for real-time applications, integrating machine learning models developed in frameworks like **scikit-learn** and **PyTorch** into production systems for immediate impact.
- Delivered robust testing frameworks utilizing tools such as **Jest** and **PyTest** to ensure high levels of reliability and maintainability across all application layers.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design intelligent systems with predictive capabilities using advanced data models, ensuring scalable, efficient solutions for users.
- Applied knowledge of CI/CD best practices to automate deployment workflows, enhancing the team's productivity and reducing manual errors.
- Conducted rigorous performance monitoring and optimization of applications to ensure all components operate efficiently within cloud environments.

• Developed scalable architecture using **FastAPI** and **Python**, migrating legacy systems to microservices architecture for enhanced performance in high-volume transactional environments.
• Delivered interactive front-end applications with **React (18)** and **TypeScript**, creating responsive user interfaces for financial tools and admin panels with Redux Toolkit and Tailwind CSS.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines, utilizing **Docker** to streamline deployment processes and ensure consistent application builds across **AWS ECS** and **Fargate** services.
• Conducted data processing by creating ETL pipelines to ingest financial data from various sources using **Python**, supporting both batch and real-time analytics capabilities.
• Designed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, allowing for proactive identification of suspicious transactions based on behavior patterns.
• Leveraged **NLP** techniques to enhance user interactions and predictive analytics features, improving overall accuracy in transaction classification.
• Created and integrated ML pipelines for real-time applications such as credit scoring and churn prediction into backend services using **Model Inference** strategies, ensuring seamless functionality for users.
• Provided real-time performance metrics and insights through analytics dashboards, using **Power BI Embedded** for operations teams to detect transaction anomalies swiftly.

• Engineered scalable backend services utilizing **Python** with **FastAPI** for a global e-commerce platform, achieving a high availability rate of **99.9%** and low latency in key modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
• Developed and maintained applications with **React** (version **18**) for dynamic frontend user experiences, enhancing performance and accessibility across both web and mobile platforms.
• Designed containerized applications using **Docker**, deploying on **AWS ECS** and **Fargate**, achieving an efficient multi-container architecture with seamless scaling.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines to facilitate automated testing and deployment processes, reducing deployment time by **30%** and all while ensuring stability and reliability across environments.
• Integrated Natural Language Processing (NLP) technologies for enhanced data processing, including model inference using current data from user interactions, leading to a **25%** increase in user engagement.
• Applied robust scalable architecture practices ensuring fault-tolerant data access through a hybrid cloud approach with **AWS** solutions, accommodating peak traffic loads significantly higher than **10,000** concurrent users.
• Utilized **Redis** for caching and fast access to product metadata, driving down server response times by **40%** and optimizing user interactions.
• Developed and implemented a model for secure payment processing leveraging industry standards with platforms such as **Stripe** and **PayPal**, ensuring compliance with PCI guidelines and data security best practices.
• Fostered effective collaboration and continuous improvement within development teams through agile methodologies, enhancing project completion rates on time by **20%**.
